netdata /

      netdata---Real-time performance monitoring, done right! https://www.netdata.cloud

lxk0301 /

      jd_scripts---基于JavaScript的京东薅羊毛工具

TheAlgorithms /

      Python---All Algorithms implemented in Python

bytedance /

      terarkdb---A RocksDB compatible KV storage engine with better performance

youzan /

      vant---Lightweight Mobile UI Components built on Vue

hotwired /

      turbo---The speed of a single-page web application without having to write any JavaScript.

inancgumus /

      learngo---1000+ Hand-Crafted Go Examples, Exercises, and Quizzes

hotwired /

      hotwire-rails-demo-chat---Repository from the Hotwire demo

alan-turing-institute /

      sktime---A unified framework for machine learning with time series

hotwired /

      turbo-rails---Turbo gives you the speed of a single-page web application without having to write any JavaScript.

nondanee /

      UnblockNeteaseMusic---Revive unavailable songs for Netease Cloud Music

iptv-org /

      iptv---Collection of 5000+ publicly available IPTV channels from all over the world

werner-duvaud /

      muzero-general---MuZero

haotian-liu /

      yolact_edge---The first competitive instance segmentation approach that runs on small edge devices at real-time speeds.

kitabisa /

      ssb---Secure Shell Bruteforcer — A faster & simpler way to bruteforce SSH server

25H /

      Maya---Maya 一个简洁小巧的快速启动工具

GitSquared /

      edex-ui---A cross-platform, customizable science fiction terminal emulator with advanced monitoring & touchscreen support.

sindresorhus /

      css-in-readme-like-wat---Style your readme using CSS with this simple trick

trekhleb /

      homemade-machine-learning---🤖 Python examples of popular machine learning algorithms with interactive Jupyter demos and math being explained

victor369basu /

      Real-time-stock-market-prediction---In this repository, I have developed the entire server-side principal architecture for real-time stock market prediction with Machine Learning. I have used Tensorflow.js for constructing ml model architecture, and Kafka for real-time data streaming and pipelining.

huanghyw /

      jd_seckill---京东秒杀商品抢购，目前只支持茅台抢购，不支持其他商品！

Tencent /

      Tendis---Tendis is a high-performance distributed storage system fully compatible with the Redis protocol.

mapsme /

      omim---🗺️ MAPS.ME — Offline OpenStreetMap maps for iOS and Android

30DaysofWebDEV /

      DSC-30-Days-of-Web---

globalaihub /
